reviews.customers_say: Customers find the robe gorgeous and appreciate its amazing quality, nice material, and love its color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should be a crime to look this fine
items.body: Yexinbridal came THRU with this piece! This is the robe of your dreams! If you want to feel like a glam QUEEN this robe is an absolute MUST. The trick to always being the sexiest, funniest, most glamorous woman, or man even, in the room is to BUYüëèüèºTHIS üëèüèºROBEüëèüèº - and also stay home, alone. It‚Äôs magic like Harry Potter‚Äôs cloak, except this robe makes EVERYONE stare, especially if you wear it to places the commoners go. Oopsies! Robe already has me talkin like a QUEEN! This robe has me goin from a hot mess to just plain hot. And it‚Äôs not JUST for bridal showers y‚Äôall. You can literally do ANYTHING in this robe, or at least make you think you can. You can do domesticated housewife sh-t, mow the lawn, or lounge around the pool with your hot mess friends. Pick your favorite color robe that matches your favorite cocktail and feel yourself transform into an old-Hollywood badass b‚Äîch. I paid extra for extra feathers cuz seriously who says no to extra feathers when they‚Äôre offered? Got one for my bestie‚Äôs birthday. Now our lives are finally complete. When the day comes, 100% confident be will be buried in these. Read more
items.author: Lena Franco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meet my new bestie...
items.body: Meet my new best friend. I am without a doubt, in love with this robe. Pleasantly surprised with what I received. After my purchase, I emailed them with my measurements and request for extra maribou. Their response and customer service was excellent! Robe arrived in 3 weeks, and was neatly folded in a sealed, protective bag. There was a very strong chemical odor, that I did expect, upon opening the bag. This is due to the feather dye I assume, or maybe a flame retardant. I am not sure. I hung the robe on a sturdy hanger, sprayed it down with Downey Wrinkle release, and hung her outside. After 1 hour, she got sprayed down again, front and back. After 2 hours the scent seemed to begin to dissipate, so I brought my new bestie inside. I used my steamer on it, and followed the advice of others to blow out the feathers in an upward motion with my hair dryer. The result was perfect! I have included a picture of the robe immediately following these steps. I could still smell a hint of this chemical smell, so I hung it in a room in our lower level for two more days. The smell has now completely dissipated. As for the fit, it is perfect. Sleeves are the correct length and robe is just right, hitting about 2‚Äù over the knee, per my request. The sash is heavy, but without loops. I wish it had pockets. My generation is pocketed people! It is a very full, heavy duty robe that fits very similar to a full cocktail style dress. It is cinched at the shoulders, leaving a very full, skirted effect when tied. The white satin is Snow White in color, no stains, and minimal feather loss, but some is to be expected. Feathers shed, period. I did request extra feathers, and wish I would have requested triple for more dramatic effect! I would suggest this as it only adds to the authenticity of the robe. I was sent an extra Amazon link for $20 processing of the extra maribou request. I assume triple would be $40. As stated, I received my robe in 3 weeks, so that was also a pleasant surprise. I highly recommend this company, and after much research and other reviews, was the reason I ordered from them. Their product is well worth the money. I will be ordering more colors. üñ§ Read more
items.author: melissa satterfield

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars no matter what size you are this Road wolf fit
items.body: I love this robe, except it was a bit big. The belt was for a giant person. Read more
items.author: Sarah R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dressing robe
items.body: I just received this in perfect time to get a birthday gift, this robe is excellent and was a hard find. It is my absolute favorite color fuchsia, I am about 5ft 2in and this fits perfectly. The sleeves are great for me, falling just past the wrists. I think it's also great for a photography project, and now I can‚Äôt stop walking around the house in it! Very good quality and low feather shed considering! I am truly pleased with this purchase, seller was very helpful, thank you so much! Read more
items.author: Paige

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I absolutely love this robe! It is so beautiful and makes me feel so good. The sleeves were a little short and the seem on the shoulder was a little off but otherwise it fit nicely. Great material, I definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Autumn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars too much
items.body: so many layers and heavy material. i felt like i was drowning in it. i feel like it ran big for a medium too. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy hermosa bata estampada por mi

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible product which was damaged at arrival
items.body: Horrible material with damage upon arrival- feathers falling off, holes in the material, not even worth $10! Read more
items.author: Em

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red+white, Brown, Light Blue+white, Emerald Green+black, Gold+black, Royalblue, Fuchsia, White+black, Dusty Pink+pink, Black, Blush+black, Champagne, Red+black, Plum+black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
